title: DI riot Remove IP Boost when starting new account?
body:
I started my account and verified it but i still dont have the ip boost
{{champion:103}}

replies.body: Yeah, it's been removed for now.  We updated our[ Preseason FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115012640908) with info, but it may have been removed due to the upcoming conversion in preseason.  Not sure what the future of boosts will hold, currently. Sorry about that!
